did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of 17 cubic boxes.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Stored off-site. Users must request boxes 48 hours in advance of desired use. Neither drop-in nor next-day requests can be fulfilled. For additional information, contact Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Paul Saunier, Jr., Accession #RG-4/2/10.701, 1960-1972, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer to the University Library, 1974 January 22 and August 20.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Paul Saunier, Jr. served the University in a variety of positions during President Shannon=s tenure as President. The Assistant to the President for University Relations and Development was a policy advising position for public relations and the coordination of fund raising organizations at the university. Mr. Saunier held the position from 1960 until the position terminated in the spring of 1967. His primary task in this role was to increase the outward flow of information and the inward flow of intellectual, moral, and financial support which the University needed in order to increase the quality and quantity of its programs. In 1967 the position of Assistant to the President for University Relations and Development was abolished. The assistant's duties were split between the new Director of Development and Public Affairs and the Director of University Relations, a position which was filled by Mr. Saunier. In 1971 Mr. Saunier's title became Director of University Community Relations, a title which more clearly represented the functions of his office as they had evolved over a five-year period. The position of Director of University Community Relations was discontinued in June 1972.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the Papers of Paul Saunier, Jr.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p: The original manuscript classification numbers for this collection are listed in parenthesis after the new Record Group Numbers:
All folders are inter-filed with RG-4/2/10.701. Group II consists entirely of RG-4/2/10.741. For more information, please see University Archives Control Folder RG-4/2.
